column1: Little Goat Diner////Having fallen in love with okonomiyaki in Japan
column2: I was pleasantly surprised by how well Little Goat delivers this lesser-known Japanese dish that's basically a savory pancake of cabbage
column4: and egg - mixed with a generous amount of mayo and sauce. I wish there was more cabbage to give it some crunch
column5: but I like that it wasn't too-heavily sauced.
